data.text: @gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth I think it is best if Neil explains to gordon how this works. Dev can most likely check this yes, but it is now wasting precious time on Devs side. If there is divorce orders in the fast track system, and it is somehow captured, the problem is not with dev, but rather with the capturers and the verifiers, and it must be fixed there. I will only let Dev look into this, if Gordon can send me a screenshot of a Divorce order that is showing on the FastTrack system
